aboutPageChromeRateHeader.message: Like us? Let The World Know.

aboutPageChromeRateText.message: If you find Block Site useful, please rate it in the Chrome Webstore. We would highly appreciate it.

aboutPageCreateBlockListText.message: Add the websites or pages you want to block to your Site List and get automatically redirected to safer, more positive sites. You can also create a list of friendly sites, and switch from blocking specific sites to only allowing certain sites to work.

aboutPageIcognitoText.message: All the Block Site functionality can also work in the incognito mode, you just need to allow it. Follow these instructions to see how it is done:

aboutPageKidsSafeText.message: Activate Adult Block via the extension menu to block all adult sites in a single click.

aboutPageOtherFuncText.message: You can switch between Blacklist and Whitelist. Choose if you want to show the "Disable Block Site" item in the context menu. Allow sending anonymous statistics, which we use to improve the Block Site functionality, all the stats are completely anonymous, don't worry. Allow notifications for new features so we can notify you for new functionality we have added. Enjoy the extension and don't forget to rate it in the Firefox Addons store:

aboutPageProductivity.message: Block Site enables you to stay focused and improve your productivity. You can easily block any distracting or harmful website. No willpower necessary.

aboutPageRigtClickMenuText.message: Right click anywhere on any website to open the quick access menu. Block sites in seconds to avoid procrastination and stay on target.

aboutPageSetUpPassText.message: Set Up a password in the Settings page to limit the access to Block Site Options, or to enable the option to access blocked sites with a password.

aboutPageTimeBlockText.message: Choose days and intervals in which you want Block Site to be active. Set up custom blocks based on your work schedule (for example: 09:00 - 17:00), so you won’t procrastinate during the day, when at work or at school.

addSiteOnboarding.message: Start adding sites you want to block to your list.

allSitesBlocked.message: All sites in your Work Mode list are blocked

allSitesUnblockedMsg.message: All sites in your Work Mode list are unblocked

mandatoryPopupFooterText.message: If you click ‘Disagree’ you can still use BlockSite, however the adult blocking feature will not be available.

mandatoryPopupText.description: #Privacy Policy.# part of text will be clickable link, don't remove # symbols
mandatoryPopupText.message: For BlockSite to be able to detect and block pages with adult content, we need your permission to access information on the sites you visit. Please click ‘Agree’ to enable this access and the use of this information as described in our #Privacy Policy#.

mandatoryPopupTitle.message:
Please make a selection in
order to proceed to BlockSite.

modalPrivacyShortText.description: #Privacy Policy.# text will be clickable link, don't remove # symbols, just ignore it
modalPrivacyShortText.message: You can’t turn on adult blocking mode unless you agree to give us access to information on the sites you visit, as stated in our #Privacy Policy#.

modalPrivacyText.description: #Privacy Policy.# text will be clickable link, don't remove # symbols, just ignore it
modalPrivacyText.message: You can't turn on adult blocking mode unless you agree to give us access to your visited URLs, IP address, operating system, and browser information, for use as described in our #Privacy Policy#.

redirectTutorialMainText.message: You can redirect your blocked sites to any website you like. Click redirect above to change this now.

reportDescriptionText2.message: Send us the web address of the adult site we missed and we'll take care of it as soon as possible. In the meantime, you can add the site to your block list.

verifyEmailModalText.message: We've just sent a confirmation email to %USER_EMAIL%. *Please click the link to verify your account and enable Password Protection. (The link will expire after 1 hour.)*

verifyEmailSuccessMsg.message: Thanks! Your email has been verified

verifyRecieveEmailText.message:
BlockSite will send you an email with a link to verify your email address.
Your email address will only be used for the purpose of Password Protection.

welcomeConfirmText.message: The adult site blocking feature requires us to have access to information on the sites you visit in order to detect and block adult sites automatically. Please note that we do not share this data with any third parties for the purposes of marketing or targeting individual users.

welcomeConfirmTitle.message: Are you sure you don’t want to enable the adult site blocking feature?

welcomeMainShortText.description: #Privacy Policy.# text will be clickable link, don't remove # symbols, just ignore it
welcomeMainShortText.message: For BlockSite to be able to detect and block pages with adult content, we need your permission to access information on the sites you visit. Please click ‘Agree’ to enable this access and the use of this information as described in our #Privacy Policy#.

welcomeMainText.description: #Privacy Policy.# text will be clickable link, don't remove # symbols, just ignore it
welcomeMainText.message: For BlockSite to be able to detect and block pages with adult content, we need your permission to access your visited URLs, IP address, operating system, and browser information. Please click ‘Agree’ to enable this access and the use of this information as described in our #Privacy Policy#.
